question: Which state government is all set to launch “Shishu Suraksha App” for protection of Child Rights?
explanation: Assam State Commission for Protection of Child Rights is set to launch a mobile application, named ‘Sishu Suraksha’ which will be launched on 14th November on the occasion of children’s Day. The purpose of the e-box is to empower citizens to take moral responsibility of protecting our future generations. The app can be used by anyone in the state of Assam to lodge a complaint which will be directly registered at ASCPCR.
